title: [Large-scale] Collaborative Design-Based Instructional Design for Teacher Dashboard Development and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online education platforms and foundational learning data analysis
context.additional_context: Requires real-time data visualization and interpretation skills in science-focused instruction

learning_goals: Learners can develop a teacher dashboard prototype by applying the three-stage iterative Design Science Research (DSR) methodology
Learners can propose improvements to the dashboard reflecting teacher feedback through collaborative design workshops
Learners can design a three-core metrics system to analyze learning engagement, assessment results, and conceptual understanding in an LMS-integrated dashboard
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
